decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed internal changes squeeze the parameters of the previously permitted building, which results in an external appearance that fails to enhance the Conservation Area or provide appropriate development for the Canal Side setting, by reason of the monolithic appearance of the roof, inappropriate use of dormers and poor fenestration. This is contrary to Policies ENV-B.1.1 (New Development) ENV-W2.2 (The Grand Union Canal and Towpath) and ENV-B.2.2 (Conservation Areas); and Hounslow's Waterside Strategy.
description: Erection of 10 x 2 bedroom, 8 x 3 bedroom and 1 x 4 bedroom flats (19 residential flats) additional  floorspace for financial (A2) and business (B1) use on ground floor and 3 storeys on Western Corner and associated parking to site
